title: Event
purpose: To enable seamless communication between users.
description: This is an innovative and modern app design with cutting-edge technology.

keyFeatures.name: User Authentication
keyFeatures.description: Secure login with JWT and hashed passwords.

frontend: Styled with Material-UI for a modern design.
backend: Developed APIs for user management and chat storage.
technicalDetails.database: Used MongoDB to store user and message data.
tools: Deployed using Netlify for the frontend and Heroku for the backend.

challengesSolved.problem: Real-time sync issues with collaborative features.
challengesSolved.solution: Integrated Socket.IO with efficient event handling.

learningOutcomes: Improved understanding of WebSocket and real-time communication.
Gained experience in managing scalable database systems.

keyFeatures.name: Custom Animations
keyFeatures.description: Eye-catching animations to enhance user experience.

keyFeatures.name: Cross-Browser Compatibility
keyFeatures.description: Seamless performance across all major browsers.

frontend: Designed with semantic HTML.Styled using CSS3 and JavaScript for dynamic behavior.
tools: Tested for compatibility on major browsers.

challengesSolved.solution: Used polyfills and CSS resets for uniformity.

title: Branding 1
purpose: To redefine visual identity for modern businesses.
description: A creative branding project focused on delivering a strong visual identity.

keyFeatures.name: Brand Guidelines
keyFeatures.description: Defined cohesive branding elements and styles.

tools: Used Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator for design.
